thread.title: BRIEF-Camping World Holdings Says Q1 Same Store Sales Rose 3.9 Pct

title: BRIEF-Camping World Holdings Says Q1 Same Store Sales Rose 3.9 Pct
text:
May 8, 2018 / 11:05 AM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Camping World Holdings Says Q1 Same Store Sales Rose 3.9 Pct Reuters Staff
May 8 (Reuters) - Camping World Holdings Inc:
* CAMPING WORLD HOLDINGS, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER RESULTS
* Q1 REVENUE $1.1 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.05 BILLION * Q1 SAME STORE SALES ROSE 3.9 PERCENT
* QUARTERLY EARNINGS PER SHARE OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK $0.08 * QUARTERLY ADJUSTED PRO FORMA EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.41
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.42 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
